message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on spatiotemporal feature representation for video-based action recognition, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG). The proposed network architecture involves information fusion and temporal transformation, which are also relevant to multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of motion vectors from compressed video stream as an alternative to optical flow, which relates to information retrieval (cs.IR).
